title: Girl with Crown
marks: Signature, date, edition LRC, below image, in pencil: [STU MEAD \'01]; botto
description: oval format; little girl with long, thick hair, wearing a crown, a sleeveless dress and Mary Jane shoes, seated on a tree stump, adjusting one of her striped knee-high stockings
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
